name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Nelson VECCHIONE, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Nelson VECCHIONE, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of June, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is Granted on the limited issue of whether Petitioner’s conviction for indecent assault merges with his involuntary deviate sexual intercourse conviction for sentencing purposes.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
676 A.2d 1192
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Nelson VECCHIONE, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 19, 1996.
